DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective study describe safety tolerability multiple dose MEDI-534 child 6 less ( < ) 24 month age infants 2 month age .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity Vaccine-like Viral Shedding MEDI-534 , Against Respiratory Syncytial Virus ( RSV ) Parainfluenza Virus Type 3 ( PIV3 ) , Healthy 6 < 24 Month-old Children 2 Month-old Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1/2a , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose-escalation , multicenter study evaluate safety tolerability multiple dose MEDI-534 10^5 10^6 median tissue culture infectious dose ( TCID50 ) RSV PIV3 seronegative child 6 < 24 month age dosages 10^4 , 10^5 10^6 TCID50 unscreened infant 2 month age .
